mapper.select: -- 获取所有车间信息 -- 生成的ID后续要丢给工作站信息做绑定 select distinct a.OOEF001 AS WORKSHOPCODE , B.OOEFL003 AS WORKSHOPNAME , a.OOEFSTUS AS DELETED from DSDATA.OOEF_T a left join DSDATA.OOEFL_T b on a.OOEF001 = B.OOEFL001 where b.ooefl002 = 'zh_CN' and b.OOEFL003 LIKE '%澳美-生产车间%' AND a.ooefent = #{erpCode} and a.OOEFSTUS = 'Y'
